Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.sender

Class AbstractSender

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.sender.AbstractSender
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConcreteCLISender, ConcreteGUISender
public abstract class AbstractSender extends Object
This class is used to avoid repetition of code. Cli and Gui have similar behaviour; They differ because of the implementation of play().

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractSender

      public AbstractSender (String ip, int port)
      Waits for commands from the player. Encodes and sends the messages on the network.
      Parameters:
      ip - the server address
      port - the server port
